summary: Encrypted journal based on calendar.vim and gnupg.vim
name: journal.vim
description:
An encrypted journal with calendar view.

COMMANDS
JournalToggle -- Toggles the journal calendar view.

MAPPINGS (<leader> is set to '\&#039, by default)
<leader>jj -- JournalToggle

You can override the default mappings by creating mappings like this:

nmap <F6> <Plug>JournalToggle

OPTIONS
g:journal_directory -- The directory that stores the journal files (default: ~/journal).
install_details:
Place script in ~/.vim/plugin and start vim.

Requires the following plugins:
gnupg.vim: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=661
calendar.vim: http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=52
